_meta.notes: Minimal manual seeds - ranges only, no scraping

airports.name: Hong Kong International Airport

taxi_to_center.notes: Metered. Add toll fees (~30 HKD). Red taxis for Hong Kong Island.

legit_transport.name: Airport Express
legit_transport.notes: To Hong Kong Station. Free shuttle to hotels.

legit_transport.name: Cityflyer/Airport Bus
legit_transport.notes: A21 to Tsim Sha Tsui, A11 to Central

legit_transport.name: Taxi
legit_transport.notes: All metered. Extra for tunnel tolls.

exit_tips: Get Octopus card at Airport Express counter
In-town check-in available at Kowloon/HK stations

coffee.notes: Cha chaan teng ~15-20, Pacific Coffee ~35-45, Starbucks ~40-60

street_meal.notes: Dai pai dong ~40-60, cha chaan teng ~50-80

tipping.notes: Not expected. 10% service charge often included. Round up at local restaurants.

payment.atm_notes: ATMs everywhere. HSBC and Hang Seng widely available.

etiquette: Let passengers exit MTR before boarding
Cash is less common in younger generation
English widely spoken in business areas
scam_warnings: Watch for fake designer goods in markets
Taxi receipts available - keep for reference
safety_tips: Typhoon warnings - check for T8 signal
Air quality can be poor - check index
Tap water safe but locals prefer bottled
